scripts.test:ci: yarn && yarn pg-test:start && sqs-local:start && yarn jest
scripts.sqs-local:stop: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'vsouza/sqs-local' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker stop
scripts.sqs-local:remove: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'vsouza/sqs-local' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker container rm
scripts.pg-local:start: npx docker run --name chute-postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=chute_development -d -p 5433:5432 postgres
scripts.pg-local:stop: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'chute-postgres' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker stop
scripts.pg-local:remove: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'chute-postgres' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker container rm
scripts.pg-test:start: npx docker run --name chute-postgres-test -e POSTGRES_DB=chute_test -d -p 5434:5432 postgres
scripts.pg-test:stop: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'chute-postgres-test' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker stop
scripts.pg-test:remove: npx docker ps -a | grep -E 'chute-postgres-test' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs npx docker container rm
scripts.pg-test-restart: yarn pg-test:stop && yarn pg-test:remove && yarn pg-test:start
